volunteer.organization: Association of Computer Engineering Students - ACES
volunteer.summary: Nenathambara Program which is a webinar series to teach Arduino and Python to School Students in rural areas. This program was organized by Association of Computer Engineering Students - ACES

projects.name: Remote Gate-keeping System
projects.summary: This is a system to communicate remotely with an outsider and receive deliveries, without making physical interactions. The system consists with an IoT component, Mobile application and a Web application. Delivery person can give the delivery to us using the IoT device and we can communicate him and also control the IoT device through the Mobile App.
highlights: Technologies: Raspberry Pi, React JS, React Native, Firebase, Python

projects.name: Smart Building: Occupancy and Access Control
projects.summary: This is an interconnected system implemented using actual hardware to emulate a Smart Building. This project was contributed by several groups and for our section, we implemented features to Keep track of occupancy of rooms and control Authorization and Authentication of the people who use them.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.summary: This is a complete Hospital Management System, Full stackimplementation of the system. Accessing and Querying Patients, Doctors, Appliances, and Tests through a web portal.

projects.name: Road Accident Analysis
projects.summary: This is an online system to provide more accurate information on road accidents. Followed Agile methodology throughout the project.
highlights: Technologies: FastAPI, MongoDB, Azure DevOps, React JS, TensorFlow
projects.url: Technologies: FastAPI, MongoDB, Azure DevOps, React JS, TensorFlow

projects.name: Single Cycle RISC 8-bit Computer
projects.summary: 8-bit minicomputer using simple logic ICs, Flip-Flops, and some memory modules. Includes an ALU, a Register File and Control Logic. Implemented data memory, instruction memory , data cache and instruction cache.
